item.title: ShinyApp - HLA frequencies and predicted HIV epitopes
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: The visualizations and data showcased in this app are an effort to present and summarize the interaction between the Human Leucocyte Antigen (HLA) class I alleles and HIV viral subtypes.

item.title: iTol - Functional HLA consensus clustering based on predicted binding affinities to HIV peptides
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)

item.title: Introduction to Complex Systems Approaches in Public Health
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: PhD course to be held in May 2025. The course places great emphasis on the practical application of the Health Complexity Framework, which serves as a fundamental tool for conducting complexity research in the field of public health. Lecturer on pattern recognition in epidemiology and public health.

item.title: Copenhagen Health Complexity Center
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: Member of the Copenhagen Health Complexity Center at the Department of Public Health, University of Copenhagen.

item.title: DANLIFE (The DANish LIFE course cohort)
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: The DANish LIFE course cohort (DANLIFE) is a nationwide, register-based, life-course cohort that is based on comprehensive and continuously updated information on social adversity and major life events from the Danish registers.

item.title: Disease trajectories in the European Health Data Space (EHDS)
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: Use case to study longitudinal health trajectories - and in particular those leading to cardiometabolic diseases using machine learning.

item.title: The Young Sleep Program
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: Patterns, mechanisms, and dynamics underlying sleep health in young adults.

item.title: Evidence Based Clinical Application of Personalised Medicine
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: Guest lecturer in medical Artificial Intelligence and Real-World Evidence sessions since 2022. Course held in fall under the Master in Precision Medicine at the University of Copenhagen.

item.title: Data Doctors
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: Founder of a decentralized community for learning Data Science among medical practictioners at Righospitalet. I created multiple open-access workshops to teach the basics of Data Science in R.
